action.action-desc: Ms. Brownley of California (for herself, Mr. Takano, Mr. Thompson of California, Ms. Pingree, Mrs. Dingell, and Mr. Zinke) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans’ Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to require congressional approval before the appropriation of funds for Department of Veterans Affairs major medical facility leases.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Build a Better VA Act.

section.header: Congressional approval of Department of Veterans Affairs major medical facility leases

subsection.text: Section 8104(a)(2) of title 38, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: by striking No funds and inserting (A) No funds;
by striking or any major medical facility lease;
by adding at the end the following new subparagraph:

subparagraph.text: No funds may be appropriated for any fiscal year for any major medical facility lease unless the Committees on Veterans’ Affairs of the Senate and House of Representatives adopt resolutions approving the lease.

subsection.text: The amendments made by subsection (a) shall apply with respect to a lease entered into after the date of the enactment of this Act.
